HamCalc 2.1 documentation
previous | next | modules | index

Python Modules¶

These are the various HamCalc core calculation packages.

  • lib – Supporting Library
  • radio – Radio Design and Engineering
    • teletube – Telescoping Aluminum Tubing
  • ham – Ham Radio Operations
  • electronics – General Electronics
    • awgexact – AWG wire size calculator
    • copwire – Copper Wire Data
    • decibel – Decibel Calculator
    • elecleng
    • ohmslaw
  • construction – Construction and Mechanical
    • arch – Arch Calculator
    • bend – Bend Allowance, Metals
    • brick – Masonry Estimator
    • conecalc – Cone Calculator
    • diamfind – Diameter Finder
    • guywires – Guy Wires for Antenna Towers/Masts
    • nmbrsize – Numbered Drills/Screws/Taps/Gauges
    • pipesize – Pipe Sizes, ANSI Standard
    • survey – Surveyor’s Calculator
    • wirecond – Wires in Conduit
    • wiremesh – Wire Mesh Screens, Wind Loads
    • beamdefl – BEAMS, Deflection in
    • beamsect – BEAMS, Properties of (Start new beam design here)
    • beltdriv – Belt Drives
    • chain – Chain Drives
    • cyl – Cylinders, Air & Hydraulic
  • math – Math, Physics, Units Conversion
    • accelr – Acceleration Calculator
    • baromtr – Barometer Reading Equivalents
    • binary – Decimal to Binary Converter
    • centrif – Centrifugal/Centripetel Force
    • chase – Speed Chase
    • curvefit – Curve Fit program
    • deciconv – Decimal Hour/Degree Converter
    • decifrac – Decimal/Fraction Converter
    • equiv – Unit Conversions
    • fibon – Fibonacci Series
    • formulae – Formula Library
    • graphs – Graphs
    • involute – Involute of a Circle
    • numderiv – Numbers and Functions
    • polygon – Polygon Dimensions
    • primenos – Prime Number Calculator
    • propcirc – Circle, Properties of
    • quadrat – Quadratic Equation Calculator
    • randnum – Random Number Generator
    • rotaplot – Cartesian/Polar Plot Rotator
    • simuleq – Simultaneous Equation Calculator
    • solutri – Triangles, solution of
    • speedtd – Speed/Time/Distance Calculator
    • trig – Trigonometric Functions
    • unitvalu – Unit Value Comparator
  • navigation – Navigation and Astronomy
    • daydusk – Daylight Dusk and Dawn Calculator
    • gridsq – Grid Square Locator (Maidenhead)
    • latlong – Latitude/Longitude Data Base
    • sunup – Sunrise, Sunset, Transit
    • moontrac – Moon Tracker
    • pathfind – Great Circle Paths & Distances
    • riseset – Sunrise/Sunset Calculator
    • satorbit – Satellite Orbit Parameters
    • timezone – Time Zones (UTC)
    • trunorth – True North via the Sun
  • calendar – Calendrical Calculations
    • caltoday – Calendar, Perpetual/Universal
    • metshowr – Meteor Shower Predictor
    • seasons – Equinoxes & Solstices
  • audio_photo – Audio, Sound and Photography
  • software – Software Engineering, Programming and Computers
    • numsort, Number Sorter
    • page437, ASCII Character Code Page 437
    • sorter, Sorter
  • other – including Finance and Nutrition
    • timeq – Time Quiz

The various UI/UX layers are in separate packages.

  • STDIO Interface
    • Intro
    • Menu
    • RJD
    • mechmenu
    • Graphs
    • GW Graphics
  • RESTful Web Services Interface
  • Command-Line Interface
  • GUI Interface
